rules: lambda subject, predicate, object : [[subject, 'is a', 'prime number'], ['prime number', 'is a', 'number']] if subject.isdecimal() and int(subject) > 1 and all(int(subject) % i for i in range(2, int(int(subject) ** 0.5) + 1)) else None
lambda subject, predicate, object : [[subject, 'is a', 'even number'], ['even number', 'is a', 'number']] if subject.isdecimal() and int(subject) % 2 == 0 else None
lambda subject, predicate, object : [[subject, 'is a', 'odd number'], ['odd number', 'is a', 'number']] if subject.isdecimal() and int(subject) % 2 == 1 else None
